name: embody-aspect
effect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon
short_effect: Embody Aspect boosts a particular stat, depending on the form of a Terastallized Ogerpon

flavor_text.the_teal_mask: The Pokémon's heart fills with memories, causing the Mask to shine and one of the Pokémon's stats to be boosted.
